channel.title: Comments on: Are You Interested in Standards?

item.title: By: paul
item.dc:creator: paul
item.description:
Hi Morgan,
Good question - I don't know yet is the honest answer. I'll get back to you via this post with more info as soon as I get it.
Regarding the UPA - is this something you want to help setup?
item.content:encoded:
Hi Morgan,

Good question – I don’t know yet is the honest answer. I’ll get back to you via this post with more info as soon as I get it.

Regarding the UPA – is this something you want to help setup?

item.title: By: Morgan McKeagney
item.dc:creator: Morgan McKeagney
item.description: Hi Paul, we'd love to be involved. Let me know what's required. Morgan
item.content:encoded:
Hi Paul,
we’d love to be involved. Let me know what’s required.
Morgan
